definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The local store has started selling baguettes and Belgian beers.
sentences.chinese: 當地的商店已經開始出售法國棍式麪包和比利時啤酒。

sentences.english: What is more, we have other two factories which are in Shanghai and Suzhou in China to supply the local market.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在上海和蘇州也有設廠，以供應當地市場爲主。

sentences.english: Locals also lit Kongming lanterns, and sent them into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 當地人還點亮孔明燈，把它們放飛到天空中。

sentences.english: And the quality yet inexpensive consumer goods from China have been warmly received by the local people here.
sentences.chinese: 中國物美價廉的日用消費品，也深受當地人民的歡迎。

sentences.english: Among 54 local breed species, 37 species distribute in Oriental.
sentences.chinese: 在54種當地繁殖鳥類中，東洋界37種。

sentences.english: This outsider was fleeced when he was shopping in a local shop.
sentences.chinese: 這個外地人在當地的一家商店購物時挨宰了。

sentences.english: Worse than the hunger, say local leaders, is the thirst.
sentences.chinese: 但在當地頭領看來，比飢餓可怕百倍的是乾渴。

sentences.english: Zargany has taken a leave of absence amid a dispute with the region's provincial council.
sentences.chinese: 薩爾曼省長在當地的一次省級議會上請假缺席。

sentences.english: Local rulers were too weak to extirpate them.
sentences.chinese: 當地的統治者力量太弱，無法根除他們。

sentences.english: The outcome for those folks was death.
sentences.chinese: 派普博士說，“那些當地人的後果就是死亡。”

sentences.english: Local media and netizens have hence nicknamed Liu a "nisemusume" or "pseudo girl.
sentences.chinese: 在那之後，他被當地媒體和網民冠以“僞娘”稱號。

sentences.english: At Kajaki the Royal Marines are training local army recruits .
sentences.chinese: 英國皇家海軍陸戰隊正在卡加克訓練當地的新兵。

sentences.english: Natives will cringe and squirm with embarrassment at such brashness.
sentences.chinese: 對於這種輕率魯莽，當地人會因尷尬而戰戰兢兢。

sentences.english: Do you want paper or plastic bags for your groceries?
sentences.chinese: 到他們當地的雜貨店時，用紙袋還是塑膠袋？

sentences.english: The local cinema has been made into a bingo hall .
sentences.chinese: 當地的電影院已被改成賓果遊戲廳了。

sentences.english: "There were thousands of them, " a villager told a local newspaper.
sentences.chinese: “青蛙的數量成千上萬，”某村民向當地報社提到。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
